title: How to Optimize Your Google Business Profile
description: Get 7x more clicks by completing your Google Business Profile properly.
requirements: Your business name, address, and phone number

steps.title: Claim or create your profile
steps.description: Make sure you own your Google Business Profile.
substeps: Go to business.google.com
Search for your business name
If it exists, click 'Claim this business' and verify
If not, click 'Add your business' and follow the steps
steps.tip: Verification usually happens by postcard (takes a week) or phone call.

steps.title: Complete every section
steps.description: Google rewards complete profiles with better rankings.
substeps: Business name: Use your real name, no keyword stuffing
Category: Pick the most specific one (e.g., 'Landscaping Company' not just 'Landscaper')
Description: Write 2-3 sentences about what you do and where you serve
Hours: Be accurate — nothing frustrates customers more than wrong hours

steps.title: Add your services
steps.description: List every service you offer with prices if possible.
substeps: Click 'Edit profile' then 'Services'
Add each service: name, description, price (optional)
Be specific: 'Water Heater Installation' not just 'Plumbing'
Add 10-15 services minimum
steps.tip: Services with prices get more clicks — customers like knowing what to expect.

steps.title: Upload lots of photos
steps.description: Businesses with photos get 42% more direction requests.
substeps: Add your logo as the profile photo
Add a cover photo (your best work)
Upload 10-20 photos of completed jobs
Add photos of yourself and your team — people hire people
steps.tip: Update photos monthly. Fresh photos signal you're active.

steps.title: Start posting regularly
steps.description: Google Posts show up in your profile and boost visibility.
substeps: Click 'Add update' or 'Posts'
Post about: recent jobs, special offers, tips for customers
Include a photo and a call-to-action
Post at least once a week

steps.title: Get and respond to reviews
steps.description: Reviews are the #1 ranking factor for local search.
substeps: Click 'Get more reviews' to get your review link
Send this link to every happy customer
Respond to EVERY review (good and bad)
Thank positive reviewers, address concerns professionally

successMessage: Your Google Business Profile is now optimized! You'll start appearing in more local searches.
proTips: Add Q&A to your profile — ask and answer common questions customers have
Check your profile weekly for customer messages — Google shows response time
Use ChatGPT to help write your business description and service descriptions
